title: BRIEF-Titan Minerals Intends To Make Formal Offer To Acquire Ecuador-Focussed Core Gold Inc
text:
BRIEF-Titan Minerals Intends To Make Formal Offer To Acquire Ecuador-Focussed Core Gold Inc

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Sep 15, 2019 21:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Titan Minerals Intends To Make Formal Offer To Acquire Ecuador-Focussed Core Gold Inc Sept 16 (Reuters) - Titan Minerals Ltd : * INTENDS TO MAKE FORMAL OFFER TO ACQUIRE 100% OF CANADIAN-BASED, ECUADOR-FOCUSSED CORE GOLD INC * OFFER TO INCLUDE 2.5 FULLY PAID ORDINARY SHARES OF TITAN FOR EACH CORE GOLD COMMON SHARE HELD, VALUING CORE GOLD SHARES AT CAD$0.422 * CO ACQUIRED ALL OF CORE GOLD'S SECURED DEBT IN PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF US$2.5 MILLION
